mapper.select:
SELECT eno, etitle, eissuedate, eexpiredate, elimitcount, ecount, ediscount, estatus FROM event
AND eno = #{searchOption.eno} AND etitle like '%'||#{searchOption.etitle}||'%' AND econtent like '%'||#{searchOption.econtent}||'%' AND estatus = #{searchOption.estatus} AND to_char(eissuedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchOption.eissuedate} AND to_char(eexpiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{searchOption.eexpiredate}
ORDER BY
eno DESC eissuedate DESC eexpiredate DESC ecount DESC
OFFSET #{pager.startRowNo}-1 ROWS
FETCH NEXT #{pager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(eno, etitle, econtent, eissuedate, eexpiredate, elimitcount, ecount, eimg ,ediscount, estatus, edetailimg, ecoupontitle) VALUES (SEQ_ENO.NEXTVAL,#{etitle},#{econtent},#{eissuedate},#{eexpiredate},#{elimitcount},#{ecount},#{eimg},#{ediscount},#{estatus},#{edetailimg},#{ecoupontitle})
